description: Arrival day in Tokyo! Landing at Haneda Airport and getting settled in the city. First taste of Tokyo vibes and some light exploration.

activities.description: Take Airport Express to central Tokyo
Check into hotel and freshen up
Dinner at nearby restaurant - try authentic ramen

transportation: Airport Express from Haneda to hotel area
notes: Keep flight confirmation handy. Download Google Translate app. Get IC card (Suica/Pasmo) for trains. Remember to bow when greeting!
